page.title: 20Farming in Woburn
page.content:
There are a number of farms in the vicinity of Woburn, mainly leased from the Bedford estate. Park Farm owned by Lady Tavistock is a stud farm and reflects the family's interest in racing. Other farms in the area include Hundreds Farm, Job's Farm, Buttermilk Farm, Apesfield Farm, Dolton's Farm, Horsemoor Farm, Cold Harbour Farm and Speedwell Farm. Hundreds Farm is now redundant. Arable farming is predominant. Strenuous efforts are being made to update the farm machinery.
{The Material in this entry was {compiled by the staff and pupils of {Fulbrook Middle School, {Woburn Sands, Milton Keynes.
